p: On the contrary, reducing power activity of the methanol extract was week. Due to the major role of phenolic compounds in antioxidant activity, low antioxidant activity of the plant extract may be a consequence of its low phenolic compounds content (Bamoniri et al., 2010 ▶). In another study, the results obtained by DPPH, FRAP and β-carotene/linoleic acid assays on antioxidant activity of leaf extracts of S. suffruticosa collected from Zahedan, Iran indicated ethanol and ethyl acetate fractions as the most powerful antioxidant of S. suffruticosa leaf extracts (Mottaghipisheh et al., 2017 ▶).
